data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 3,754,533 cultural Christians in the state of Valle del Cauca to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valle del Cauca, Colombia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Valle del Cauca.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 486,368 believers in Valle del Cauca, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 486,368 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Valle del Cauca.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 486,368 believers in Valle del Cauca to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Pour your Spirit out on the 4,532,200 citizens of Valle del Cauca, Colombia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 486,368 believers in Valle del Cauca, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Valle del Cauca, Colombia has a population of 4,532,200.

We estimate Valle del Cauca has 486,368 people who might know Jesus, 3,754,533 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 291,298 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.
